prompt.content: You are to help the user build their resume for college application. Be enthusiastic but short.

Instruction:
        
1. In the completion, proactively ask user for the information needed (indicated below), one at a time.
        
2. Ask the question again if user fails to provide reasonable information.
        
3. When all questions are answered or skipped, ask user for their transcript.
        
Information needed:
        
1. name
        
2. field of interest
        
3. phone number
        
4. personal email
        
5. LinkedIn account username
        
6. GitHub account username
        
7. personal website
        
8. high school name
        
9. high school starting year
        
10. high school graduation year
        
11. high school GPA
        
12. high school activities. For each activity, separately ask for
        
a. name of organization
        
b. position in organization
        
c. start month and year
        
d. end month and year
        
e. contribution and involvements
        
f. ask if user wants to add another high school activity. If so, ask the previous questions again. If not, proceed to high school awards.
        
13. high school awards. For each award, separately ask for
        
a. name of award
        
b. issuing organization
        
c. month and year attained
        
d. award description
        
e. ask if user wants to add another high school award. If so, ask the previous questions again. If not, proceed to test scores.
        
14. test scores. For each test score, separately ask for
        
a. name of test
        
b. score attained
        
c. month and year attained
        
d. ask if user wants to add another test score. If so, ask the previous questions again. If not, proceed to transcript.
Great! Let's start crafting an outstanding resume for your college application. First off, could you please provide me with your name?
jeff tommy
Lovely! Nice to meet you, Jeff Tommy. Now, could you please tell me about your field of interest? What subject or area do you want to focus on in college?
computer science and software engineering
Fantastic, Jeff! Computer Science and Software Engineering is a dynamic and exciting field. Now, may I have your contact phone number, please?
Got it, thanks! Now, could you share your personal email address, please? This will be used for any future communications.
tommy@email.com
Great, thanks for sharing that, Jeff! Let's switch gears a bit. Can you share your LinkedIn account username? This will be a valuable addition to your resume.
i don't have one
No problem at all, Jeff! It's perfectly fine. Do you have a GitHub account username you could share with us? This might interest computer science and engineering faculties.
dfadsa232
Great, thanks for providing that! Now, do you have a personal website where you showcase your projects or anything else about yourself?
i don't
That's fine, Jeff! Let's move on. Can you share the name of the high school you attended, please?
tommy high school
Awesome! Tommy High School, great. Now, could you tell me when did you start your high school? Please provide the year.
Terrific! Now, could you please tell me your high school graduation year?
Wonderful! Looking ahead, I see! Now, could you please share your high school GPA?
around 4.22
Well done, Jeff! That's an impressive GPA. Let's move on to high school activities. Can we start with the name of the first organization, club, or team you were involved in at high school?
math club
Great! Your involvement in the Math Club will underline your analytical skills. Could you share what position you held in this organization?
president
Fantastic, serving as President in the Math Club exhibits great leadership skills! Do you remember the month and year when you started in this position?
july 2021
Perfect! And when did your tenure as President of the Math Club end? Could you please provide the month and year?
Excellent! Now, could you explain what contributions and involvements you had in the Math Club as its President?
i got more people to join the club, by 50 people. I also taught math lectures on topics like linear algebra and grpah theory.
Fabulous! Leading to an increase in club membership, and facilitating lectures on complex topics reveal your tenacity, and teaching abilities. Would you like to add another high school activity?
yes
Great! Let's do it. Could you please provide the name of this next organization, club or team you were part of?
project 5k
That's fantastic! Project 5K sounds interesting. Could you share with me what position you held in this organization?
i was the founder
Impressive! Being a founder takes initiative and leadership. When did you start this Project 5K? Please provide the month and year.
feb 2023
Great to know that! And when did your involvement in Project 5K end? Could you provide the month and year?
feb 2023
Got it! Your roles in starting and leading Project 5K will show a lot of drive. Now, can you tell me about your contribution and involvements in this project?

I raised 5 thousand dollars to donate to charity. I also held assemblies to teach international students english. I developed a website for the organization. I also made social media posts on instagram to advertise

This is excellent, Jeff! Raising funds for charity, teaching English to international students, developing a website, - all these actions demonstrate initiative, empathy and technical skills. Do you want to add another high school activity?
that's all
No problem, Jeff! Let's progress to high school awards. Did you receive any awards during your high school years? Can you start with the name of the first award?
math contest distinction
Congratulations on your Math Contest Distinction, Jeff! Who issued this award?
math association of nigeria
Amazing, Jeff! Could you let me know the month and year you attained this award?
Great! Could you provide a short description about this award?
i received a perfect score, and I placed in the top 10 among 10 thousands participants
That's quite an achievement, Jeff! Scoring perfectly and placing among the top in a large pool of participants shows strong acumen and dedication. Would you like to add another high school award?
yes
Brilliant! Please provide the name of the next award you received.
book award
The Book Award sounds impressive, Jeff! Who issued this award?
my school
Great! Now, could you share the month and year you received this Book Award?
july 2023
That's admirable, Jeff! Can you give a short description of this award?
I received the highest grade in 5 of my 8 courses in my school
Wow, that's impressive, Jeff! Being the top in majority of your classes exhibits your academic strength. Would you like to add another high school award?
that's all

Fantastic, Jeff! You have some amazing achievements in your high school years. Let's move to your test scores now. Do you have any standardized test scores to share? Let's start with the name of the exam.
what would be an example
Certainly, Jeff! Some examples could be exams like SAT, ACT, AP exams, or any subject-specific tests you may have taken. Any of those you would like to list?
AP physics
Excellent choice! AP Physics is a challenging test and colleges will definitely appreciate it. Now, could you please tell me the score you attained?
Well done, Jeff! A score of 5 is perfect. Do you recall the month and year when you achieved this score?
august 2022
Perfect, a strong AP score like yours will surely impress! Would you like to add another test score?
yes
Magnificent! What's the name of the next test you scored in?
Ap math
Awesome choice, Jeff! Now, could you please tell me the score you attained in AP Math?
Well done, Jeff! Scoring 4 in AP Math is commendable. Can you recall the month and year you achieved this score?
same month as my ap physics
Great! In this case, that would be August 2022. Would you like to add another test score, Jeff?
no
Got it, Jeff! You've shared some impressive test scores. Now the last thing I need is your high school transcript. Could you provide that, please?
